name: Greywing
headline: The Operating System for Maritime
description:
Greywing is a platform for ship operators to automate their business, through actionable intelligence, better data and communication.

Greywing today serves three product lines to customers:

*Flotilla* is a monitoring tool for vessels, enabling vessel managers to identify fleet-level patterns and optimizations and to identify risk and liability vectors in advance.

*CRY4* is an operational tool for individual vessels that allows crew managers, security officers and masters to gather intelligence about a vessels current or proposed route, making decisions about the safest and the cheapest ports of call that a vessel can be directed to.

*Landfall* is a crew management and analysis system to provide risk reporting and detailed editing capabilities about the crew on-board a vessel.

*Semaphore* is a port-agent communications tool meant to simplify the process of interfacing with large numbers of port agents while planning a port call.

founders.name: Nick Clarke, Founder
founders.description: Former Royal Marine Commando,  bootstrapped entrepreneur. Now turning data into Crew Changes in the maritime industry.

## Your copilot to master maritime data
Talk to your data and make better decisions.
## Technical üìã
Talk to complex Cargo and Machinery Operations Manuals
## Crewing üö¢
Replace, track and identify available crew and missing documents with a question.
## Flights ‚úàÔ∏è
Ask for the best available flights from your Travel Agents in real-time.
## Visas üìÅ
Verify all travel requirements for Crew to make sure they OK to Travel.
## Chartering üì¶
Talk to your your VMS, prefixture, and market data.
[Get Started](https://grey-wing.com/<https:/calendly.com/greywing-gtm-team/greywing-leadership-team-30mins>)
Trusted by the industry's largest disruptors.
![BW Group](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgreywing-blog-static.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fbw_logo_117e4099f4.png&w=1920&q=75)
![BW LNG](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgreywing-blog-static.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fbw_lng_logo_6fa6c67b9e.jpg&w=1920&q=75)
![IINO Lines](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgreywing-blog-static.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fiino_lines_black_d890fae318.png&w=1920&q=75)
![Hafnia](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgreywing-blog-static.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fhafnia_logo_e0bf87a402.png&w=1920&q=75)
## Proteus
### Artificial Intelligence in Maritime
AI is here, and so is the Maritime Industry's first patent pending Model Orchestration to identify gaps and employ data-driven AI solutions that save time, resources, and money.
![Proteus Demo](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Fimages%2Fhome%2Fmockup-imac.webp&w=1920&q=75)
Assess 
### pRoteus
born at greyWing
### Connect to your data
Data is convoluted and hard to mobilise when you need a quick win. Proteus plugs into your legacy software and extracts the relevant data points for you within seconds. Go from summarizing line items of spare part expenses over the past few weeks to getting a list of outstanding demurrage invoices.
Give me a a breakdown of which ranks most commonly fail a drug and alcohol test.
Based on the data we gathered, the chart below shows the distribution of drug and alcohol test failures among different ranks. It helps to identify which positions may need more attention in terms of monitoring and support.
Download as Excel
![...](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Fimages%2Fdevices%2Fmacbook-13-frame.webp&w=1920&q=75)
### Let the data talk to you.
Proteus enables you to save prompts that aid regular business decision making cycles, thereby letting the data in your systems talk to you. Think of it as an AI powered checklist to get you through your day.
![ruler](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Fimages%2Fhome%2Fsaved-prompts.png&w=1920&q=75)
[Access Proteus](https://grey-wing.com/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/1HFNFCpBZMQCrwA9JGWw5Akd5Fhi7dTv3QvdU38m42RCoUq1uSheB0CKHd0yXURmr>)
## Features
### Multilingual Support
Converse with Proteus in over 40 languages. Enjoy voice-activated access to derive quick insights for your Crewing, Commercial, or Technical Team.
![multilingual-support](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Fimages%2Fhome%2Fproteus-multilingual.webp&w=1920&q=75)
### Export your insights
All insights from Proteus can be visualized in any format: from bar graphs to complex tables. Export your data in to Microsoft or Power BI in Seconds and always be presentation-ready.
![data-export](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Fimages%2Fhome%2Fdata-export-desktop.webp&w=1920&q=75)
### Access all your software in one place
We pull as much data as you want to give us into one data lake so that data remains un-silo-ed and easy to retrieve across business units.
![access-all](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Fimages%2Fhome%2Fall-laptop.webp&w=1920&q=75)
### Make better Decisions
Greywing places the insights you need to make decisions at your finger tips. With our search bar that plugs into all of your most valuable data
![flotilla-search](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Fimages%2Fhome%2Fflotilla-search.webp&w=1920&q=75)
### Distance, Time, Speed... Bunkers
Quickly predict voyage timelines and use your bunker consumption curves to estimate deviation costs.
![ruler](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Fimages%2Fhome%2Fruler.webp&w=1920&q=75)
### Track Activity
Get an overview of all the committed activity on Greywing to ensure you have a comprehensive audit trail of your team's actions.
![track-activity](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Fimages%2Fhome%2Ftrack-activity.webp&w=1920&q=75)
### Real time Vessel Tracking
Always have situational awareness of where your vessel is on a map. Geo-locate your vessel instantly on our interactive map with live Satellite AIS or your voyage system.
![time-travel](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Fimages%2Fhome%2Ftime-travel.webp&w=1920&q=75)
[Get Started](https://grey-wing.com/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/1HFNFCpBZMQCrwA9JGWw5Akd5Fhi7dTv3QvdU38m42RCoUq1uSheB0CKHd0yXURmr>)
## Privacy and Security
### Built with your privacy in mind
Don't let software providers hold your data hostage. Greywing connects to any and all softwares and can push data within itself out to our clients.
  * Certified:Our providers are transparent, run on cloud providers with SOC2, ISO certifications, and are only allowed access to data on user request.
  * PII protected:Greywing can remove your personally identifiable information from data so that only approved providers can even see them,.
  * Encrypted both in transport and at rest:All of your data sits exactly where you want it to, protected with multiple layers of security.


### Set your permissions
Assign people in charge for certain activities and establish locked actions in order to mimic your real life workflows on Greywing.
## Backed By
![Y Combinator](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgreywing-blog-static.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fyc_logo_2e80f29c8a.png&w=1920&q=75)
![Rebel Fund](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgreywing-blog-static.s3.amazonaws.com%2Frebel_logo_0fcdfefdb6.png&w=1920&q=75)
![Transmedia capital](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgreywing-blog-static.s3.amazonaws.com%2Ftransmedia_logo_125bde1632.png&w=1920&q=75)
![Flexport](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgreywing-blog-static.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fflexport_logo_861a3d18a6.png&w=1920&q=75)
![I2BF](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgreywing-blog-static.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fi2bf_logo_af0f7fb878.png&w=1920&q=75)
![Entrepreneur First](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgreywing-blog-static.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fentreprenuer_first_logo_4ff2634843.png&w=1920&q=75)
![Endeavour Ventures](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgreywing-blog-static.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fendeavour_logo_8a213f07e3.png&w=1920&q=75)
![Motion Ventures](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgreywing-blog-static.s3.amazonaws.com%2FMV_Logo_white_baf1a29385.png&w=1920&q=75)
[Get Started](https://grey-wing.com/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/33ax6NAQSZFH2v23zNxKKQhhYk2JezL9VKqduSThxjXnJMMygHta4JQmJutgN5cFJ>)
![footer background](https://grey-wing.com/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Fimages%2Fhome%2Ffooter-bg.webp&w=1920&q=75)

generated_description:
### Greywing: Revolutionizing Maritime Operations

Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, **Greywing** is setting the pace for innovation in the maritime industry. With a bold mission to be ‚ÄúThe Operating System for Maritime,‚Äù Greywing aims to automate the business of ship operations through actionable intelligence, enhanced data, and streamlined communication.

#### Product Offerings

Greywing has crafted a suite of tools tailored for different needs within maritime operations:

1. **Flotilla**: A monitoring tool that helps vessel managers analyze fleet-level data, recognize optimization opportunities, and preemptively spot risks.

2. **CRY4**: This operational tool is designed for individual vessels, aiding crew managers, security personnel, and shipmasters in making informed decisions about safe and cost-effective routing.

3. **Landfall**: A comprehensive crew management system that focuses on risk reporting and crew documentation oversight.

4. **Semaphore**: A communication platform that simplifies interactions with numerous port agents during the planning of port calls.

Located in Singapore and with a compact team of three, Greywing is making waves in a traditionally stagnant sector, combining modern technology with maritime expertise to provide significant operational efficiencies.

#### Leading with AI

At the forefront of Greywing‚Äôs initiatives is **Proteus**, an AI-driven solution designed to uncover data insights and optimize decision-making. Its capabilities include real-time access to complex operational manuals and crew management, multilingual support, data export features for business presentations, and an interactive interface that aggregates data from various software into a unified platform.

Greywing isn't just focused on improving efficiency; they‚Äôre also dedicated to maintaining privacy and security. Their system is built with robust measures for data protection, ensuring that users maintain control over their information.

#### Trusted by Leaders in the Industry

Greywing's cutting-edge tools are already in use by industry disruptors such as BW Group, BW LNG, IINO Lines, and Hafnia, displaying the trust and recognition it has garnered in a short span of time.

#### Conclusion

If you're in maritime operations and looking to harness the power of data and AI to streamline your processes, Greywing offers a compelling set of resources. Their tools not only make operational tasks easier but can also unlock substantial revenue opportunities. 

For more information and to see how Greywing can support your maritime journey, check out their website: [Greywing](https://grey-wing.com/).

---

By focusing on automation and intelligence, Greywing is poised to transform how maritime businesses operate. It's an exciting time for this company, as they continue to innovate and shape the future of the industry.
